original_title: Peter Kay: Live at the Top of the Tower
overview: Peter Kay's hilarious stand up show. This is a live recording of his show in Blackpool which is one of the fastest selling comedy titles ever. Filmed in front of a packed, partisan crowd, Live At The Top Of The Tower is the freshest most hilarious stand up show from the country's funniest new comedian.
title: Peter Kay: Live at the Top of the Tower
